about_the_game:
Cordelia is a princess with a heart too big to fit inside her body. She must follow her heart to defeat the Ice Queen and her cold creature creations.

Traverse the ever changing lands and go on an platforming adventure with many different obstacles to overcome and secrets to find.

Gain mysterious items to aid you in your quest to find if true love really exist in a cold world.

Simple fun

Directional input + Two button controls that are easy to learn and feels great.

Retro fantasy adventure

NES and Amiga inspired graphics, aesthetics and gameplay.

Powerful items and loot

The world is filled with loot that you must work cleverly to obtain.

Remixed layout

Handcrafted levels gets scrambled with a new level layout to make each run unique.

Mysterious lands

Visit lands that are vastly different from each other.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
